overview: Babu Jalhana (Aunt Jalhana) is leading a gathering of Tausug Christâ€™s believers in the outskirts of Sulu. She is being discipled by Angel and Joy, two missionaries from the cities. Amidst the challenge of the ongoing pandemic, persecution of their faith and her physical disability, she perseveres strongly in her devotion together with other believing women in the village.
title: Babu Jalhana
